channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cloud Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-41746|2024-10-01T16:58:33.179Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cloud%20manager
item.description: Remote command execution due to improper input validation. The following products are affected: Acronis Cloud Manager (Windows) before build 6.2.23089.203.
